clinical_study.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of paracervical block for pain relief in office hysteroscopy - particularly with the placement of the Essure device. Subjects will be randomized to receive either paracervical block or saline, and will have pain assessments performed throughout the procedure. Subjects and physicians will be blinded to group assignments.
clinical_study.inclusion_criteria:
:
- Women eligible and scheduled for office hysteroscopic placement of essure devices
clinical_study.exclusion_criteria:
:
- Planned secondary procedures
- Lidocaine allergy
- Repeat procedures
